author: BelgianBricker
title: absolutely exellent
review:
I love these "Xtra" polybags. I recently got several of the botanical ones along with several of the food ones.

This "set" comes with a variety of different foods and a storage crate. The food selection is all over the place, and that is a good thing. We get apples alongside of pizza, bananas alongside of a turkey, icecream alongside of croissants. I love it. The only downside is that there are no drinks, unless you count in the 2 red cups. I could have gone without the red cups and with, for example a winebottle. It would have made this an even bigger treat. 

These polybags will especially come in handy for MOC builders and will fit into any scene from any era.

If you are down on LEGO-food, and you need a fine selection for a very decent price, this is the set to get! No Doubt.
